description: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
attrs: Bonus +3 Strength +6 Agility +3 Intelligence +5 Attack speed
info: For strength heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 11 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 11 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 6 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.96 armor, 11 attack speed, 0.3% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.
